<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
JumpOverDecl occurs when a label jumps over a variable declaration.

Example:
 func f() int {
 	goto L
 	x := 2
 L:
 	x++
 	return x
 }
```
